item.title: Fed Signals Potential Rate Cuts in 2026
item.description: Federal Reserve officials indicated they may consider interest rate reductions later this year if inflation continues to moderate.

item.title: Stocks Rally on Strong Earnings Reports
item.description: Major tech companies reported better-than-expected quarterly results, driving equities higher.

item.title: Oil Prices Surge Amid Middle East Tensions
item.description: Crude oil futures jumped 5% following reports of increased geopolitical risks in the Middle East.

item.title: European Central Bank Holds Rates Steady
item.description: The ECB maintained its key interest rates unchanged at its latest policy meeting.

item.title: China's Economy Shows Signs of Recovery
item.description: Latest data suggests China's economic growth may be accelerating in Q1.
